SET( SOURCES
  if_allbits_else.cpp
  if_else_allbits.cpp
  if_one_else_zero.cpp
  if_zero_else_one.cpp
  if_else_zero.cpp
  if_zero_else.cpp
  negif.cpp
  negifnot.cpp
  seladd.cpp
  selsub.cpp
  ifnotadd.cpp
  ifnotsub.cpp
  selinc.cpp
  seldec.cpp
  ifnotinc.cpp
  ifnotdec.cpp
  logical_andnot.cpp
  logical_ornot.cpp
  logical_notand.cpp
  logical_notor.cpp
  mask2logical.cpp
# List of scalar test files for toolbox boolean
   )

nt2_module_add_tests(boost.simd.base.boolean.scalar.unit ${SOURCES})
